divs: sighting detailswhen i drove back home from a friend, i drove on the n225 from woudenberg tozeist. when i was driving, i just happend to look a bit up to the sky. for noreason at all. i was driving about 80 km an hour in my car, driving in a curvein the road. but yet, i could clearly see a few lightb4s in the sky that seemed to be linked. it was dome-shaped, the dome, createdby the lights. in the centre\middle, there was also one light. the rest couldnot be seen, because it was or black like the sky, or transparant. it seemed tobe hovering above a hotel, which is closeby. i immedietly slowed down my car,and backed up, because it was disappering behind some trees. i havenb4t seen the object moving, but when i stopped the car from backing up, i couldnot see it any more. i guess i saw it for one second, but it was very visibleand clear. i immedietly thought it was an ufo. this, because it was not movingand seemed to be hovering. i also have a few books about ufob4s and recognised it as an ufo.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Austerlitz
This sighting has never been favorited.
